subject: JUnit or JTest ?
msgSnippet: We are evaluating products and was wondering about your opinion about which tools to use for unit testing. Criteria are: - fast/flexible development of test
messageBody:
We are evaluating products and was wondering about your opinion about
which tools to use for unit testing.

Criteria are:
- fast/flexible development of test cases
- usable in a j2ee architecture
- support for regression testing.

Any opinion from you would be highly appreciated.
Kind Regards,
Marco Pas
